What we built so far.

Some apps to help you study.

Quick Algebra

Paid, no ads.

Quick Algebra solves linear algebra problems, matrices and systems of equations.
This is the full version and provides access to all the functions, but a free version is also available, learn more by visiting the page

# Android # Windows Phone
Jump to Quick Algebra

Quick Algebra Free

Free, with ads.

Quick Algebra Free solves linear algebra problems, matrices and systems of equations.
This is the free version with limited number of functions, but a complete version is also available, learn more by visiting the page

# Android # Windows Phone
Jump to Quick Algebra Free

Quick Fit

Free, no ads.

Quick Fit is an useful tool when you need to perform a regression on some data.

# Android
Jump to Quick Fit

Simple Bubble Shooter

Free, no ads.

Simple Bubble Shooter is the classic bubble shooter game with a flat and minimal design.
